name: Easy Shadow Link (Jump)
description: An easy version of Shadow Link equipped with jumping abilities, capable of jumping in various directions.
InternalName: 雑魚シャドウリンク（ジャンプ）

fields.name: Unknown Variable 4a
fields.description: Defines some unknown behavior or state for the actor when using jumping abilities.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction the actor is facing or moving when jumping.
